tool_description: Trims audio tracks by removing unwanted sections at the beginning, end, or middle, with precision timing controls.

start_time.description: Start time in seconds for the trimmed section

end_time.description: End time in seconds for the trimmed section

fade_in_ms.description: Fade-in duration in milliseconds at trim start

fade_out_ms.description: Fade-out duration in milliseconds at trim end

error_messages: Invalid track ID: The specified track_id does not exist.
Invalid time range: start_time must be less than end_time and within track duration.
Negative time values: start_time and end_time must be non-negative.
Fade duration too long: Fade durations cannot exceed half the trimmed section length.
usage: Specify track_id, start_time, and end_time to define the section to keep. Optionally add fade_in_ms and fade_out_ms for smooth transitions.

trimmed_track_id.description: New track ID for the trimmed audio

new_duration.description: Duration of the trimmed track in seconds
